column1: #Text=Sokka says : " Now men , it 's important that you show no fear when you face a firebender .
#Text=Until your fathers return from the War , they 're counting on you to be the men of this tribe , and that means no potty breaks !
#Text=" Southern Water Tribe boy says : " But I really got ta go !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Okay , who else has to go ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Have you seen Aang ?
#Text=Gran - Gran said he disappeared over an hour ago .
#Text=We do n't have time for fun and games with the War going on !
